titles.title: For Unto Us A Child Is Born

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
For unto us a child is born,
Unto us a Son is given,
Unto us a Son is given;
And His name shall be called
Wonderful, Counselor,
The mighty God,
The Everlasting Father,
The Prince of Peace;
The Everlasting Father,
The Prince of Peace.
